metadata.title: Bling Bling NY Mens Thick Tight Link Yellow Gold Finish Solid 12mm Miami Cuban Link Chain/Bracelet Box Lock 20-30 inches
features: Width: 12mm; Chain Length: 24 inches. Secure Box Lock.
DURABLE & LONG LASTING; 316 stainless steel. Suitable for daily wear, outdoor, shower, gym and sports. Easy functioning clasp. Robust and strong links. Smooth shining finish.
LOW MAINTENANCE; Resistant to discolouration, sweat, heat, tarnish, water, smudge. UNLIKE sterling silver, gold, brass, fashion plated jewellery. Can be stored away without tarnishing.
HYPOALLERGENIC FINISH; Suitable for sensitive skin and allergy prone skin. Will not irritate skin or cling to clothing. Please do not use if allergic to stainless steel.

Excellent quality at affordable price. 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE ensures this will quickly become your favorite no-risk purchase. We guarantee all our customers 100% satisfaction from our products.We Pride in keeping our customers happy and satisfied. You'll want to wear it every day. HURRY AND BUY NOW while we have this remarkable handmade set in stock. This makes a wonderful gift for spouse, boyfriend, lover. Excellent birthday gift, anniversary present, Christmas gift, Valentines gift.
description: Made with 14K Yellow Gold finish over Stainless Steel. The necklace is a Solid, Heavy. The piece featured here is made with cuban style, thick links. Hypoallergenic stainless steel.
